text: Berlina may refer to: *Sedan (automobile), a style of passenger car *Alfa Romeo 1750 Berlina, an automobile produced from 1968 to 1977 *Holden Berlina, an automobile produced by the Holden subsidiary of General Motors since 1984 *Opel Rekord Berlina, a specification level of the Opel Rekord automobile produced by the Opel subsidiary of General Motors *Phillips Berlina, a neo- classic car produced from 1980 to 1983
title: Berlina
